ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: SWG
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry you didn t like it. Myself, I haven t experienced any of the bugs most ppl have been complaining about, so I guess I got lucky. The lag gets to me
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry you didn't like it. Myself, I haven't
experienced any of the bugs most ppl have been
complaining about, so I guess I got lucky. The lag
gets to me sometimes, but that's because I got the
cheapest 64 meg card I could get away with, lol.

For me, it's so nice to be able to do something other
than kill kill kill the same ole monsters over and
over again. Just my opinion, of course.

Mel

--- Gina Peterson <gina@...> wrote:
> > Gotta ask. What is SWG?
>
> Star Wars Galaxies. And I have to say, this is the
> first place I have even
> heard people happy about it.... myself, I'm glad I
> got to beta it, because I
> would have sure been ticked off if I had paid all
> that money for it! And I
> waited for that game for years. What a
> disappointment. When I went to get my
> pre-order deposit back, the manager said that they
> had been giving a
> whooooole lot of deposits back...
>
> Guess I'll just wait for EQII. :-)
>
> ~Kyndara Silverleaf~
> Pathfinder of Karana,
> Firiona Vie
> <Circle of Sisters>
>
>
>
>


=====
~~~~~~~~~

And on the eighth day God said, "O.K. Murphy. You take over."
